 This page is for discussing how to add jSCEP to your own project using Maven.  For details     
 on how to _build_ jSCEP using Maven, see the [SourceCode source code] page.

jSCEP should be available from the central Maven repository soon.  In the meantime, it is available from the [http://oss.repository.sonatype.org/content/repositories/releases/ Sonatype OSS repository].
